channel.title: [DELTA 317] changing npc stats? [317 DELTA]
channel.description:
Hey guys, i have a problem.
My corp beast:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/bandicam2011-06-1818-09-41-679.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/corp.gif[/img]
does not hit anything (he only hit's 0's) how do i make him hit harder?

item.title: [DELTA 317] changing npc stats? [317 DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

[quote=“sirmashni1, post:2, topic:399751”]go in NPCHandler.java and find something like this

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { // jad rand_npc = misc.random(500); }
copy and paste it under but change npcType == 2745 by your npc id

after find something like

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { // jad hitDiff = misc.random(99); }
change npcType and hitDiff == misc.random(99) is the damage you want so in this code my jad do 0 to 99 dmg

after that go down after all hitDiff = misc.random you should see

add && npcs[NPCID].npcType != your npc id
it should work :)[/quote]

i did all that, it came up with no errors, run.exe worked, but he still didnt hit anything ???

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA 317] changing npc stats? [317 DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @sirmashni1 sirmashni1
item.description:
@sirmashni1 wrote:

go in NPCHandler.java and find something like this

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { // jad rand_npc = misc.random(500); }
copy and paste it under but change npcType == 2745 by your npc id

after find something like

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745) { // jad hitDiff = misc.random(99); }
change npcType and hitDiff == misc.random(99) is the damage you want so in this code my jad do 0 to 99 dmg

after that go down after all hitDiff = misc.random you should see

add && npcs[NPCID].npcType != your npc id
it should work

Read full topic
